column6: Peter Parker: Paparazzi! Part 2 of 3 Are Pete's paparazzi pics inspiring a super celebrity stalker?  Is he responsible for all of her grisly acts?  Even if he is, what can Spider-Man do about it?  How can anyone stop the freaky powers of Paper Doll?
column8: | penciller (cover):Marcos Martin | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Javier Rodriguez | writer:Dan Slott
